Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) self:x( SCREEN_CENTER_X ) self:y(SCREEN_TOP) self:vertalign('top') self:zoomto( SCREEN_WIDTH,78,0,0) self:diffusetopedge(0,0,0,1) self:diffusebottomedge(0,0.2,1,1) end
%function(self) self:x( SCREEN_CENTER_X ) self:y( SCREEN_CENTER_Y-163 ) self:zoomto( SCREEN_WIDTH,2,0,0) end
